arts.ttl: Transcript: Xabi Alonso’s Pre-Match Press Conference Ahead of Real Madrid vs Espanyol in La Liga
arts.sum: Xabi Alonso knows it will be a challenging game against Los Periquitos, but the home crowd will be a significant factor in the match. Alonso spoke to the media ahead of the La Liga game against Espanyol.

arts.ttl: Official: One in, one out as Real Madrid name squad to face Espanyol
arts.sum: La Liga table-toppers Real Madrid have on Friday unveiled the club’s latest squad. And it features noteworthy inclusions and exclusions alike on the part of Xabi Alonso and his staff.…

arts.ttl: Real Madrid receive major fitness boost for La Liga clash with Espanyol
arts.sum: Endrick returns to the Real Madrid squad for Saturday's La Liga clash against Espanyol, but four Los Blancos players miss out.

arts.ttl: Real Madrid dealt fresh blow before Espanyol

arts.ttl: Official: Real Madrid squad list to face Espanyol – youngster returns
arts.sum: Real Madrid will be gunning to extend their winning streak to six games in all competitions this season, when they take on RCD Espanyol in La Liga on Saturday. Under Xabi Alonso, Real Madrid have won all of their first four La Liga games this season and started their UEFA Champions League campaign with a […] The post Official: Real Madrid squad list to face Espanyol – youngster returns appeared first on Madrid Universal.

arts.ttl: Mbappé’s Real Madrid hosts unbeaten Espanyol with La Liga lead at stake
arts.sum: A win at Madrid, combined with Getafe taking at least a point at Barcelona, would see Espanyol move into first place after five rounds. The France striker has scored six goals in five games this campaign, including a double in a 2-1 win over Marseilles in their Champions League opener this week.

arts.ttl: Alonso talks Mbappe, Vinicius, Huijsen, Valverde, Rodrygo, Camavinga ahead of Real Madrid vs Espanyol
arts.sum: Just a few days after securing a 2-1 win over Olympique de Marseille in the UEFA Champions League, Real Madrid return to action on Saturday, this time in La Liga, where they take on RCD Espanyol. arts.ttl: Espanyol star warns Real Madrid – ‘Our confidence is sky high, that makes us dangerous’
arts.sum: Real Madrid take on RCD Espanyol in Matchweek 5 of the 2025/26 La Liga season at the Santiago Bernabeu on Saturday. The Merengues have maintained a 100% record so far this season, winning five in five across all competitions, and will be gunning for their sixth win tomorrow. The Merengues are at the top of the table, having won four in four this season. arts.ttl: Real Madrid vs Espanyol : Predicted Lineup for La Liga Clash
arts.sum: The injuries to Trent Alexander-Arnold and Antonio Rudiger, and now the suspension of Dean Huijsen, mean there is a mini crisis when it comes to defensive players available. Real Madrid take on Espanyol on September 20, with head coach Xabi Alonso facing some significant questions regarding his starting XI selection.
